source_text: A bill is introduced either as part of a legislative proposal or as a legislative motion from a Member of Parliament.
modified_source_text: A bill is introduced either as part of a legislative proposal or as a legislative motion from a Member of Parliament.
target_text: Lakiesitys tehdään joko lainsäädäntöehdotuksen osana tai kansanedustajan lainsäädäntöesityksenä.

source_text: A decision agenda is compiled automatically by the electronic decision support system from the information on the presentation file.
modified_source_text: A decision agenda is compiled automatically by the electronic decision support system from the information on the presentation file.
target_text: Päätösagenda kootaan automaattisesti sähköisen päätöksenteon tukijärjestelmän avulla esitysaineiston tiedoista.

source_text: A desicion was made in 2014 to combine the Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts; the new document is known as the Government Annual Report.
modified_source_text: A desicion was made in 2014 to combine the Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts; the new document is known as the Government Annual Report.
target_text: Vuonna 2014 tehtiin desicion, jossa yhdistettiin hallituksen vuosikertomus ja valtion tilinpäätös; uusi asiakirja tunnetaan nimellä valtioneuvoston vuosikertomus.

constraints.from_lemma: Report on the Final Central Government Accounts
constraints.from_surface: Report on the Final Central Government Accounts

source_text: A government plenary session proposes decisions in matters to be submitted to the President of the Republic; issues government decrees and the statements, reports and communications that are to be delivered to Parliament; and makes decisions on the governmental and administrative matters prescribed in the Government Rules of Procedure.
modified_source_text: A government plenary session proposes decisions in matters to be submitted to the President of the Republic; issues government decrees and the statements, reports and communications that are to be delivered to Parliament; and makes decisions on the governmental and administrative matters prescribed in the Government Rules of Procedure.
target_text: Hallituskokous esittää tasavallan presidentille annettavia päätöksiä, antaa valtioneuvoston asetuksia sekä valtioneuvostolle annettavia lausuntoja, selvityksiä ja tiedonantoja sekä tekee päätöksiä valtioneuvoston työjärjestyksessä määrätyistä valtiollisista ja hallinnollisista asioista.

constraints.from_lemma: communication of a government plenary session

source_text: A minister's responsibilities may include work at a number of different ministries, i.e., the ministry at which he/she discharges duties corresponding to his/her title and potentially other ministries.
modified_source_text: A minister's responsibilities may include work at a number of different ministries, i.e., the ministry at which he/she discharges duties corresponding to his/her title and potentially other ministries.
target_text: Ministerin tehtäviin voi kuulua työ useissa eri ministeriöissä eli ministeriössä, jossa hän suorittaa virka-asemaansa ja mahdollisesti muita ministeriöitä vastaavia tehtäviä.

source_text: A ministerial working group is an informal body.
modified_source_text: A ministerial working group is an informal body.
target_text: Ministerityöryhmä on epävirallinen elin.

source_text: A parliamentary reply contains the text of a legislative proposal passed by Parliament or an announcement that a government proposal has been rejected.
modified_source_text: A parliamentary reply contains the text of a legislative proposal passed by Parliament or an announcement that a government proposal has been rejected.
target_text: Eduskunnan vastaus sisältää eduskunnan hyväksymän lakiesityksen tekstin tai ilmoituksen hallituksen esityksen hylkäämisestä.

source_text: A report to a committee may be submitted either in response to a request from a parliamentary committee or on the initiative of the Government or a ministry.
modified_source_text: A report to a committee may be submitted either in response to a request from a parliamentary committee or on the initiative of the Government or a ministry.
target_text: Valiokuntaan voidaan antaa mietintö joko eduskunnan valiokunnan pyynnöstä tai valtioneuvoston tai ministeriön aloitteesta.

source_text: A session agenda is compiled automatically by the electronic decision support system from the information on the presentation file.
modified_source_text: A session agenda is compiled automatically by the electronic decision support system from the information on the presentation file.
target_text: Istuntosuunnitelma kootaan automaattisesti sähköisen päätöksenteon tukijärjestelmän avulla esitystiedoston tiedoista.

source_text: According to the Constitution which came into force on 1 March 2000, the President can no longer appoint a cabinet without the concurrence of Parliament.
modified_source_text: According to the Constitution which came into force on 1 March 2000, the President can no longer appoint a cabinet without the concurrence of Parliament.
target_text: 1. maaliskuuta 2000 voimaan tulleen perustuslain mukaan presidentti ei voi enää nimittää hallitusta ilman parlamentin hyväksyntää.

source_text: After independence in 1918, the Judicial Division was replaced by the Supreme Court, and the Senate (Economic Division) became the Government (1 and 2).
modified_source_text: After independence in 1918, the Judicial Division was replaced by the Supreme Court, and the Senate (Economic Division) became the Government (1 and 2).
target_text: Itsenäistymisen jälkeen vuonna 1918 korkeimman oikeuden tilalle tuli oikeusosasto, ja senaatista (talousosasto) tuli hallitus (1 ja 2).

source_text: After receiving a reply to the interpellation, Parliament discusses the matter and may then proceed to vote on the confidence enjoyed by the Government or the minister.
modified_source_text: After receiving a reply to the interpellation, Parliament discusses the matter and may then proceed to vote on the confidence enjoyed by the Government or the minister.
target_text: Saatuaan vastauksen välipuheeseen eduskunta keskustelee asiasta ja voi sen jälkeen äänestää hallituksen tai ministerin nauttimasta luottamuksesta.

source_text: Also attending the meeting are the Chancellor of Justice, the State Secretary appointed for the Prime Minister’s term of office and the Director of Government Communications.
modified_source_text: Also attending the meeting are the Chancellor of Justice, the State Secretary appointed for the Prime Minister’s term of office and the Director of Government Communications.
target_text: Kokoukseen osallistuvat myös oikeuskansleri, pääministerikaudelle nimitetty valtiosihteeri ja valtioneuvoston viestintäjohtaja.

source_text: As an organisational unit the Government includes the Chancellor of Justice and the Office of the Chancellor of Justice.
modified_source_text: As an organisational unit the Government includes the Chancellor of Justice and the Office of the Chancellor of Justice.
target_text: Organisaatioyksikkönä hallitukseen kuuluvat oikeuskansleri ja oikeuskanslerin kanslia.

source_text: At a ministry, a matter may also be presented by a public official other than a presenting official of the Government.
modified_source_text: At a ministry, a matter may also be presented by a public official other than a presenting official of the Government.
target_text: Ministeriössä asian voi esittää myös muu virkamies kuin valtioneuvoston esittävä virkamies.

source_text: Cf. informal government meeting, which is not an official decision-making forum.
modified_source_text: Cf. informal government meeting, which is not an official decision-making forum.
target_text: Ks. hallituksen epävirallinen kokous, joka ei ole virallinen päätöksentekofoorumi.

source_text: Example: Minister at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs.
modified_source_text: Example: Minister at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs.
target_text: Esimerkki: Ministeri ulkoministeriössä.

source_text: Examples of statutes are acts, decrees, Parliament's Rules of Procedure, and acts enacted by the Åland Parliament.
modified_source_text: Examples of statutes are acts, decrees, Parliament's Rules of Procedure, and acts enacted by the Åland Parliament.
target_text: Esimerkkejä säädöksistä ovat säädökset, asetukset, eduskunnan työjärjestys ja Ahvenanmaan eduskunnan säätämät säädökset.

source_text: Extraordinary ministerial committees may be appointed to prepare a specific matter or matters.
modified_source_text: Extraordinary ministerial committees may be appointed to prepare a specific matter or matters.
target_text: Erityisten asioiden tai asioiden valmistelua varten voidaan asettaa ylimääräisiä ministerikomiteoita.

source_text: Finland's principal constitution act, issued on 17 July 1919.
modified_source_text: Finland's principal constitution act, issued on 17 July 1919.
target_text: Suomen pääperustuslaki, annettu 17. heinäkuuta 1919.

source_text: Government plenary sessions are chaired by the Prime Minister.
modified_source_text: Government plenary sessions are chaired by the Prime Minister.
target_text: Hallituksen täysistuntojen puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri.

source_text: If the President of the Republic does not approve a bill, the bill is returned to Parliament; it becomes law even without presidential approval if Parliament passes it again without changing its substance.
modified_source_text: If the President of the Republic does not approve a bill, the bill is returned to Parliament; it becomes law even without presidential approval if Parliament passes it again without changing its substance.
target_text: Jos tasavallan presidentti ei hyväksy lakiesitystä, lakiehdotus palautetaan eduskunnalle; siitä tulee laki jopa ilman presidentin hyväksyntää, jos eduskunta hyväksyy sen uudelleen muuttamatta sen sisältöä.

source_text: If there is no specific provision in the law on who is to issue the decree, it is issued by the Government.
modified_source_text: If there is no specific provision in the law on who is to issue the decree, it is issued by the Government.
target_text: Jos laissa ei ole erityistä säännöstä siitä, kuka asetuksen antaa, sen antaa valtioneuvosto.

source_text: In 2016, the ministry changed its name to Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment.
modified_source_text: In 2016, the ministry changed its name to Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment.
target_text: Vuonna 2016 ministeriö muutti nimensä työ- ja elinkeinoministeriöksi.

constraints.from_lemma: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment
constraints.from_surface: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Employment

source_text: In contrast to other informal government meetings, the government evening session is also attended by the chairpersons of the parliamentary groups of the Government parties.
modified_source_text: In contrast to other informal government meetings, the government evening session is also attended by the chairpersons of the parliamentary groups of the Government parties.
target_text: Hallitusten muihin epävirallisiin kokouksiin verrattuna hallitusiltaisistuntoon osallistuvat myös hallituspuolueiden eduskuntaryhmien puheenjohtajat.

source_text: In the decision agenda procedure, matters are decided without debate in accordance with a written proposal submitted by a presenting official.
modified_source_text: In the decision agenda procedure, matters are decided without debate in accordance with a written proposal submitted by a presenting official.
target_text: Päätös agendamenettelyssä asioista päätetään ilman keskustelua esittävän virkamiehen kirjallisen ehdotuksen mukaisesti.

source_text: It has been possible to appoint ministers without a portfolio to governments in order to ensure a political balance.
modified_source_text: It has been possible to appoint ministers without a portfolio to governments in order to ensure a political balance.
target_text: On ollut mahdollista nimittää ministereitä, joilla ei ole salkkua hallituksille, poliittisen tasapainon varmistamiseksi.

source_text: It is also used in compiling information on government decisions.
modified_source_text: It is also used in compiling information on government decisions.
target_text: Sitä käytetään myös hallituksen päätöksiä koskevien tietojen kokoamiseen.

source_text: It oversees the implementation of the Government Programme, coordinates the preparation and deliberation of matters to be decided at European Union level and manages the state's ownership policy.
modified_source_text: It oversees the implementation of the Government Programme, coordinates the preparation and deliberation of matters to be decided at European Union level and manages the state's ownership policy.
target_text: Se valvoo hallitusohjelman toimeenpanoa, koordinoi Euroopan unionin tasolla päätettäväksi tulevien asioiden valmistelua ja käsittelyä sekä hallinnoi valtion omistuspolitiikkaa.

source_text: Matters submitted to the President for decision are presented by ministers.
modified_source_text: Matters submitted to the President for decision are presented by ministers.
target_text: Presidentin päätettäväksi jätetyt asiat esittelevät ministerit.

source_text: Parliamentary communications provide notification of the consideration of reports, the lapsing of legislative proposals, elections by Parliament, and the like.
modified_source_text: Parliamentary communications provide notification of the consideration of reports, the lapsing of legislative proposals, elections by Parliament, and the like.
target_text: Eduskunnan tiedonannot antavat ilmoituksen mietintöjen käsittelystä, lakiehdotusten lakaisemisesta, eduskunnan vaaleista ja muista vastaavista.

source_text: Parts of the Act on Decision-Making in the Government and the Ministries were included in the 1993 Government Act.
modified_source_text: Parts of the Act on Decision-Making in the Government and the Ministries were included in the 1993 Government Act.
target_text: Osa valtioneuvoston ja ministeriöiden päätöksentekolaista sisällytettiin vuoden 1993 hallituslakiin.

source_text: Presentation files are used by a presenting official of the Government using the electronic decision support system.
modified_source_text: Presentation files are used by a presenting official of the Government using the electronic decision support system.
target_text: Esitystiedostoja käyttää valtioneuvoston esittävä virkamies sähköisen päätöksenteon tukijärjestelmän avulla.

source_text: Presentation files are used in Ministerial Finance Committee sessions, government plenary sessions, and presidential sessions.
modified_source_text: Presentation files are used in Ministerial Finance Committee sessions, government plenary sessions, and presidential sessions.
target_text: Esitystiedostoja käytetään valtiovarainministerien talousvaliokunnan istunnoissa, hallituksen täysistunnoissa ja presidentin istunnoissa.

source_text: Presidential decrees mostly relate to the bringing into force of treaties or other international obligations.
modified_source_text: Presidential decrees mostly relate to the bringing into force of treaties or other international obligations.
target_text: Presidentin asetukset liittyvät enimmäkseen sopimusten tai muiden kansainvälisten velvoitteiden voimaan saattamiseen.

source_text: Repealed by Act (1121/1993).
modified_source_text: Repealed by Act (1121/1993).
target_text: Kumottu lailla (1121/1993).

source_text: Repealed by the Constitution Act adopted on 1 March 2000.
modified_source_text: Repealed by the Constitution Act adopted on 1 March 2000.
target_text: Kumottu 1. maaliskuuta 2000 annetulla perustuslakilailla.

source_text: Repealed by the Constitution Act adopted on 1 March 2000.
modified_source_text: Repealed by the Constitution Act adopted on 1 March 2000.
target_text: Kumottu 1. maaliskuuta 2000 annetulla perustuslakilailla.

source_text: Since 1 March 2000 referred to as a government decree.
modified_source_text: Since 1 March 2000 referred to as a government decree.
target_text: maaliskuuta 2000 alkaen hallituksen asetuksella.

source_text: Since 1 March 2000 referred to as a ministerial decree.
modified_source_text: Since 1 March 2000 referred to as a ministerial decree.
target_text: maaliskuuta 2000 alkaen ministerin asetuksella.

source_text: The Chancellor of Justice is in attendance at all sessions.
modified_source_text: The Chancellor of Justice is in attendance at all sessions.
target_text: Oikeuskansleri on läsnä kaikissa istunnoissa.

source_text: The Constitution Act forms the core of Finnish constitutional legislation (see Constitution).
modified_source_text: The Constitution Act forms the core of Finnish constitutional legislation (see Constitution).
target_text: Perustuslaki on Suomen valtiosääntölainsäädännön ydin (ks. perustuslaki).

source_text: The Constitution Act is the highest norm in the hierarchy of norms.
modified_source_text: The Constitution Act is the highest norm in the hierarchy of norms.
target_text: Perustuslaki on normihierarkian korkein normi.

source_text: The Constitution Act that came into force on 1 March 2000 replaced four acts which had together comprised the Constitution: the Constitution Act of Finland, the Parliament Act, the Act on the High Court of Impeachment, and the Act on the Right of Parliament to Inspect the Lawfulness of the Official Acts of the Members of the Council of State, the Chancellor of Justice and the Parliamentary Ombudsman.
modified_source_text: The Constitution Act that came into force on 1 March 2000 replaced four acts which had together comprised the Constitution: the Constitution Act of Finland, the Parliament Act, the Act on the High Court of Impeachment, and the Act on the Right of Parliament to Inspect the Lawfulness of the Official Acts of the Members of the Council of State, the Chancellor of Justice and the Parliamentary Ombudsman.
target_text: Maaliskuun 1. päivänä 2000 voimaan tullut perustuslakilaki korvasi neljä lakia, jotka yhdessä olivat olleet perustuslakilaki, eduskuntalaki, laki korkeimmasta tuomioistuimesta sekä laki eduskunnan oikeudesta tarkastaa valtioneuvoston jäsenten, oikeuskanslerin ja eduskunnan oikeusasiamiehen virallisten säädösten laillisuus.

constraints.from_lemma: Act on the High Court of Impeachment
constraints.from_surface: Act on the High Court of Impeachment

constraints.from_lemma: Act on the Right of Parliament to Inspect the Lawfulness of the Official Acts of the Members of the Council of State, the Chancellor of Justice and the Parliamentary Ombudsman
constraints.from_surface: Act on the Right of Parliament to Inspect the Lawfulness of the Official Acts of the Members of the Council of State, the Chancellor of Justice and the Parliamentary Ombudsman

source_text: The Council is chaired by the Prime Minister.
modified_source_text: The Council is chaired by the Prime Minister.
target_text: Neuvoston puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri.

source_text: The Economic Council is chaired by the Prime Minister.
modified_source_text: The Economic Council is chaired by the Prime Minister.
target_text: Talousneuvoston puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri.

source_text: The Finnish name of the Governing Council was changed from ‘hallituskonselji’ to ‘senaatti’ in 1816.
modified_source_text: The Finnish name of the Governing Council was changed from ‘hallituskonselji’ to ‘senaatti’ in 1816.
target_text: EKP:n neuvoston suomenkielinen nimi muutettiin hallituskonseljista senaatti-nimisiksi vuonna 1816.

source_text: The Government Annual Report (2) and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report..
modified_source_text: The Government Annual Report (2) and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report..
target_text: Valtiontalouden tilinpidon toimintakertomus (2) ja selvitys valtion tilinpäätöksestä yhdistettiin vuonna 2014 ja siitä laadittiin hallituksen vuosikertomus.

constraints.from_lemma: Report on the Final Central Government Accounts
constraints.from_surface: Report on the Final Central Government Accounts

source_text: The Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report.
modified_source_text: The Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report.
target_text: Valtion tilinpäätös ja vuosikertomus yhdistettiin vuonna 2014 ja niistä laadittiin hallituksen vuosikertomus.

source_text: The Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report..
modified_source_text: The Government Annual Report and Report on the Final Central Government Accounts were combined in 2014, creating the Government Annual Report..
target_text: Valtion tilinpäätös ja vuosikertomus yhdistettiin vuonna 2014 ja niistä laadittiin hallituksen vuosikertomus.

source_text: The Ministerial Finance Committee session is chaired by the Prime Minister, with the Permanent Secretary to the Ministry of Finance acting as secretary.
modified_source_text: The Ministerial Finance Committee session is chaired by the Prime Minister, with the Permanent Secretary to the Ministry of Finance acting as secretary.
target_text: Valtiovarainministeriön talousvaliokunnan istunnon puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri, sihteerinä valtiovarainministeriön kansliapäällikkö.

source_text: The Ministry existed from 1918 to 2007, when it became the Ministry of Employment and the Economy.
modified_source_text: The Ministry existed from 1918 to 2007, when it became the Ministry of Employment and the Economy.
target_text: Ministeriö oli olemassa 1918, jolloin siitä tuli työ- ja elinkeinoministeriö.

source_text: The Ministry existed from 1989 to 2007, when it became the Ministry of Employment and the Economy.
modified_source_text: The Ministry existed from 1989 to 2007, when it became the Ministry of Employment and the Economy.
target_text: Ministeriö oli olemassa 1989, jolloin siitä tuli työ- ja elinkeinoministeriö.

source_text: The Ministry operated from 1918 to 1921 and 1939 to 1949.
modified_source_text: The Ministry operated from 1918 to 1921 and 1939 to 1949.
target_text: Ministeriö toimi vuosina 19181921 ja 19391949.

source_text: The Ministry was established in 1970.
modified_source_text: The Ministry was established in 1970.
target_text: Ministeriö on perustettu vuonna 1970.

source_text: The Ministry was established in 1970.
modified_source_text: The Ministry was established in 1970.
target_text: Ministeriö on perustettu vuonna 1970.

source_text: The President conducts Finnish foreign policy in collaboration with the Government; appoints members of the Government in accordance with a proposal by the Prime Minister, who is chosen by Parliament; approves bills; has the authority to issue decrees; and is the Supreme Commander of the Defence Forces.
modified_source_text: The President conducts Finnish foreign policy in collaboration with the Government; appoints members of the Government in accordance with a proposal by the Prime Minister, who is chosen by Parliament; approves bills; has the authority to issue decrees; and is the Supreme Commander of the Defence Forces.
target_text: Presidentti johtaa Suomen ulkopolitiikkaa yhteistyössä hallituksen kanssa; nimittää valtioneuvoston jäsenet eduskunnan valitseman pääministerin esityksen mukaisesti; hyväksyy lakiesitykset; on toimivaltainen antamaan asetuksia; ja on puolustusvoimien ylipäällikkö.

source_text: The President has the right to dissolve Parliament following a reasoned proposal by the Prime Minister and to pardon persons convicted of crimes.
modified_source_text: The President has the right to dissolve Parliament following a reasoned proposal by the Prime Minister and to pardon persons convicted of crimes.
target_text: Presidentillä on oikeus hajottaa eduskunta pääministerin perustellun ehdotuksen perusteella ja armahtaa rikoksista tuomitut henkilöt.

source_text: The Prime Minister's Office deals with matters concerning the Government (1 and 2) as well as matters arising between Parliament and the Government.
modified_source_text: The Prime Minister's Office deals with matters concerning the Government (1 and 2) as well as matters arising between Parliament and the Government.
target_text: Valtioneuvoston kanslia käsittelee valtioneuvostoa (1 ja 2) sekä eduskunnan ja valtioneuvoston välisiä asioita.

source_text: The Prime Minister's Office is also responsible for government matters that do not fall within the competence of any other ministry.
modified_source_text: The Prime Minister's Office is also responsible for government matters that do not fall within the competence of any other ministry.
target_text: Valtioneuvoston kanslia vastaa myös sellaisista hallitusasioista, jotka eivät kuulu minkään muun ministeriön toimivaltaan.

source_text: The Senate was divided into the Judicial Division and the Economic Division.
modified_source_text: The Senate was divided into the Judicial Division and the Economic Division.
target_text: Senaatti jaettiin oikeusosastoon ja talousosastoon.

source_text: The core of the Constitution is contained in the Constitution Act.
modified_source_text: The core of the Constitution is contained in the Constitution Act.
target_text: Perustuslain ydin on perustuslakilaissa.

source_text: The current title is the Government Act.
modified_source_text: The current title is the Government Act.
target_text: Nykyinen nimi on valtioneuvoston laki.

source_text: The decision support system allows a presenting official of the Government to draft presentation files electronically and then to distribute the files and any additional documents.
modified_source_text: The decision support system allows a presenting official of the Government to draft presentation files electronically and then to distribute the files and any additional documents.
target_text: Päätöksen tukijärjestelmä mahdollistaa valtioneuvoston esittävän virkamiehen laatia esitysasiakirjat sähköisesti ja jakaa sitten tiedostot ja mahdolliset lisäasiakirjat.

source_text: The last government to have had a minister without a portfolio was that which was in power in 1949.
modified_source_text: The last government to have had a minister without a portfolio was that which was in power in 1949.
target_text: Viimeinen hallitus, jolla oli ministeri ilman salkkua, oli se, joka oli vallassa vuonna 1949.

source_text: The last non-partisan caretaker government was that of Prime Minister Liinamaa in 1975.
modified_source_text: The last non-partisan caretaker government was that of Prime Minister Liinamaa in 1975.
target_text: Viimeinen puolueeton virkaatekevä hallitus oli pääministeri Liinamaan hallitus vuonna 1975.

source_text: The meeting is chaired by the Prime Minister, with the Head of the Government Session Unit, or another person designated by the Prime Minister, as secretary.
modified_source_text: The meeting is chaired by the Prime Minister, with the Head of the Government Session Unit, or another person designated by the Prime Minister, as secretary.
target_text: Kokouksen puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri, hallituksen istuntoyksikön päällikkö tai muu pääministerin nimittämä henkilö sihteeriksi.

source_text: The portfolio responsibilities of ministers are determined by a government plenary session.
modified_source_text: The portfolio responsibilities of ministers are determined by a government plenary session.
target_text: Ministerien vastuualueet määritellään valtioneuvoston täysistunnossa.

source_text: The previous title was Act on the Number of Ministries in the Government and their General Sphere of Competence.
modified_source_text: The previous title was Act on the Number of Ministries in the Government and their General Sphere of Competence.
target_text: Edellinen osasto oli laki valtioneuvoston ministeriöiden lukumäärästä ja niiden yleisestä toimivalta-alueesta.

constraints.from_lemma: Act on the Number of Ministries in the Government and their General Sphere of Competence
constraints.from_surface: Act on the Number of Ministries in the Government and their General Sphere of Competence
to_lemmas: laki valtioneuvoston ministeriöiden lukumäärästä ja yleisestä toimialasta

source_text: The reply to a written question is given in writing no later than 21 days after the question is delivered to the Government.
modified_source_text: The reply to a written question is given in writing no later than 21 days after the question is delivered to the Government.
target_text: Kirjalliseen kysymykseen vastataan kirjallisesti viimeistään 21 päivän kuluttua siitä, kun kysymys on toimitettu valtioneuvostolle.

source_text: The report on the final central government accounts comprised the final central government accounts and the government’s report on the accounts.
modified_source_text: The report on the final central government accounts comprised the final central government accounts and the government’s report on the accounts.
target_text: Valtion tilinpäätösselonteko koostui valtion tilinpäätöksestä ja valtion tilinpäätöksestä.

source_text: The responsibilities of a permanent secretary include overseeing the administrative management of the ministry and ensuring that the ministry's duties are carried out effectively.
modified_source_text: The responsibilities of a permanent secretary include overseeing the administrative management of the ministry and ensuring that the ministry's duties are carried out effectively.
target_text: Vakituisen sihteerin tehtäviin kuuluu ministeriön hallinnon valvonta ja ministeriön tehtävien tehokas hoitaminen.

source_text: The responsibilities of the Defence Council were transferred to the Cabinet Committee on Foreign and Security Policy on 1 March 2000.
modified_source_text: The responsibilities of the Defence Council were transferred to the Cabinet Committee on Foreign and Security Policy on 1 March 2000.
target_text: Puolustusneuvoston tehtävät siirtyivät ulko- ja turvallisuuspoliittisen ministerivaliokunnan vastuulle 1.3.2000.

source_text: The single-party ministerial group determines the position to be taken on matters pending in the Government.
modified_source_text: The single-party ministerial group determines the position to be taken on matters pending in the Government.
target_text: Yksipuolueministeriryhmä päättää valtioneuvostossa vireillä olevissa asioissa otettavasta kannasta.

source_text: The statutory ministerial committees are chaired by the Prime Minister.
modified_source_text: The statutory ministerial committees are chaired by the Prime Minister.
target_text: Lakisääteisten ministerikomiteoiden puheenjohtajana toimii pääministeri.

source_text: The statutory ministerial committees are: the Ministerial Committee on Foreign and Security Policy, the Ministerial Committee on European Union Affairs, the Ministerial Finance Committee and the Ministerial Committee on Economic Policy.
modified_source_text: The statutory ministerial committees are: the Ministerial Committee on Foreign and Security Policy, the Ministerial Committee on European Union Affairs, the Ministerial Finance Committee and the Ministerial Committee on Economic Policy.
target_text: Lakisääteiset ministerivaliokunnat ovat: ulko- ja turvallisuuspoliittinen ministerivaliokunta, EU-ministerivaliokunta, valtiovarainministerivaliokunta ja talouspoliittinen ministerivaliokunta.

constraints.from_lemma: Ministerial Committee on Foreign and Security Policy
constraints.from_surface: Ministerial Committee on Foreign and Security Policy

constraints.from_lemma: Ministerial Committee on European Union Affairs
constraints.from_surface: Ministerial Committee on European Union Affairs

source_text: The system generates session agendas and decision agendas automatically from the presentation files and facilitates compilation of session records.
modified_source_text: The system generates session agendas and decision agendas automatically from the presentation files and facilitates compilation of session records.
target_text: Järjestelmä tuottaa esitystiedostoista automaattisesti istunto- ja päätösagendat ja helpottaa istuntotietojen kokoamista.

source_text: The system transmits official documents to Parliament, handles incoming parliamentary replies and communications, and sends documents automatically to the print office.
modified_source_text: The system transmits official documents to Parliament, handles incoming parliamentary replies and communications, and sends documents automatically to the print office.
target_text: Järjestelmä välittää parlamentille virallisia asiakirjoja, käsittelee parlamentin saapuvia vastauksia ja viestintää sekä lähettää asiakirjat automaattisesti tulostustoimistoon.

source_text: The term ‘government session’ refers to a number of specific decision-making forums of the Government, i.e. government plenary sessions, presidential sessions and Ministerial Finance Committee sessions.
modified_source_text: The term ‘government session’ refers to a number of specific decision-making forums of the Government, i.e. government plenary sessions, presidential sessions and Ministerial Finance Committee sessions.
target_text: Hallituksen istunto tarkoittaa useita erityisiä valtioneuvoston päätöksentekofoorumeita eli valtioneuvoston täysistuntoja, presidenttien istuntoja ja valtiovarainministerien valiokuntien istuntoja.

source_text: The title was amended by Act 1120/1993.
modified_source_text: The title was amended by Act 1120/1993.
target_text: Nimitystä muutettiin lailla 1120/1993.

source_text: The title was amended under Act (1120/1993).
modified_source_text: The title was amended under Act (1120/1993).
target_text: Otsikkoa muutettiin lailla (1120/1993).

source_text: Unlike a government session, an informal goverment meeting is not an official decision-making forum of the Government.
modified_source_text: Unlike a government session, an informal goverment meeting is not an official decision-making forum of the Government.
target_text: Toisin kuin hallitusistunnon, epävirallinen hallituskokous ei ole hallituksen virallinen päätöksentekofoorumi.

source_text: Until the end of February 2000 a statute issued by a ministry was referred to as a ministerial decision or ministerial resolution.
modified_source_text: Until the end of February 2000 a statute issued by a ministry was referred to as a ministerial decision or ministerial resolution.
target_text: Helmikuun 2000 loppuun asti ministeriön antamaa ohjesääntöä kutsuttiin ministerin päätökseksi tai ministerin päätöslauselmaksi.

source_text: Until the end of February 2000, a statute issued by a government plenary session was referred to as a government decision or government resolution.
modified_source_text: Until the end of February 2000, a statute issued by a government plenary session was referred to as a government decision or government resolution.
target_text: Helmikuun 2000 loppuun saakka hallituksen täysistunnon antamaa ohjesääntöä kutsuttiin hallituksen päätökseksi tai hallituksen päätöslauselmaksi.

source_text: Until the end of February 2000, an administrative statute issued by the President was referred to as a decree.
modified_source_text: Until the end of February 2000, an administrative statute issued by the President was referred to as a decree.
target_text: Helmikuun 2000 loppuun saakka presidentin antamaa hallinnollista ohjesääntöä kutsuttiin asetukseksi.

source_text: When a minister works at a ministry in the latter sense, he/she uses the title Minister at the Ministry of.... This same title is used when one minister is substituting for another.
modified_source_text: When a minister works at a ministry in the latter sense, he/she uses the title Minister at the Ministry of.... This same title is used when one minister is substituting for another.
target_text: Kun ministeri työskentelee ministeriössä jälkimmäisessä merkityksessä, hän käyttää arvonimeä ministeri ministeriössä.... Tätä samaa arvonimeä käytetään, kun yksi ministeri korvaa toisen.

source_text: constitution act concerning Parliament, issued on 13 January 1928.
modified_source_text: constitution act concerning Parliament, issued on 13 January 1928.
target_text: perustuslakilaki, joka koskee parlamenttia, annettu 13. tammikuuta 1928.
